projects.name: Synapse
projects.desc: Synapse is a data visualization app that maps your learning journey. It was built using MERN technology.

projects.name: Space EMS
projects.desc: Space EMS is an Asteroids clone built using a MVC framework and P5.js.

projects.name: Game Finder
projects.desc: Built with Pure CSS and Jquery, Game Finder utilizes 3rd party APIs to find popular games on sale.

projects.name: Note Taker
projects.desc: Built using Express.js, Note Taker, utilizes its own API to create a dynamic Notepad.

projects.name: Quiz Time
projects.desc: A multiple choice quiz to test your knowledge of The IT Crowd
projects.alt: Photo of a question mark written on a blackboard

projects.name: Weather App
projects.desc: A dynamic weather app built with 3rd party APIs
